CustomField.description: The type of human intervention required: Approval (formal approval process), ConfirmationThenApproval (LLM confirms first, then formal approval), or ConditionalApproval (LLM decides if approval needed based on context).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Approval = always require formal approval. ConfirmationThenApproval = LLM confirms, then formal approval. ConditionalApproval = LLM analyzes context to decide if approval needed.
CustomField.label: HITL Type
